question: What has keys but can't open locks?
I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
hint: It's something you can hear but cannot see.

question: What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?
I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?
hint: It's something you use to locate places.

question: The more of this there is, the less you see. What is it?
What has a heart that doesn't beat?
What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
hint: It's something you stick on mail.

question: What gets wetter as it dries?
hint: You use it after a shower.

question: I'm tall when I'm young, and I'm short when I'm old. What am I?
What can you catch but not throw?
What goes up but never comes down?
What has an eye but can't see?
What belongs to you but is used more by others?
I'm light as a feather, yet the strongest man can't hold me for much longer than a minute. What am I?
hint: Everyone has it, but it's not visible.

question: What has many teeth, but can't bite?
I'm taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I'm never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
I have a tail and a head, but no body. What am I?
hint: You use it to buy things.

question: If you have me, you want to share me. If you share me, you haven't got me. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
What has a neck but no head?
What has hands but can't clap?
What runs around the whole yard without moving?
I can fly without wings. I can cry without eyes. Wherever I go, darkness flies. What am I?
hint: It floats in the sky and brings rain.

question: What can fill a room but takes up no space?
What has a face and two hands but no arms or legs?
What kind of coat can only be put on when wet?
What is full of holes but still holds water?
What has one eye but can't see?
What has to be broken before you can use it?
What has an end but no beginning, a home but no family, and a space without room?
What building has the most stories?
What tastes better than it smells?
What has to be kept after it is given to you?
What kind of room has no doors or windows?
What begins with T, ends with T, and has T in it?
What has four fingers and a thumb, but isn't alive?
What has a bottom at the top?
What's easy to get into, but hard to get out of?
hint: It's something you might want to avoid.

question: What has words, but never speaks?
What gets bigger the more you take away?
I have keys but open no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but can't go outside. What am I?
What has legs, but doesn't walk?
What flies without wings?
What comes down, but never goes up?
What is so fragile that saying its name breaks it?
What kind of tree can you carry in your hand?
hint: It's also part of your hand.

question: Forward I am heavy, but backward I am not. What am I?
I have branches, but no fruit, trunk, or leaves. What am I?
I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?
What comes once in a year, twice in a month, four times in a week, and six times in a day?
What can run, but never walks, has a mouth, but never talks?
What has a ring but no finger?
If two's company, and three's a crowd, what are four and five?
What has many keys, but can't open a single lock?
What starts with an E, ends with an E, but only contains one letter?
What type of dress can never be worn?
What begins with P, ends with E, and has thousands of letters?
I'm always on the dinner table, but you don't get to eat me. What am I?
What is cut on a table, but never eaten?
What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks?
What has a thumb and four fingers, but is not alive?
If I drink, I die. If I eat, I am fine. What am I?
What comes once in a second, once in a minute, but never in a thousand years?
What is lighter than a feather, yet the strongest man cannot hold it for much longer than a minute?
What can travel all around the world without leaving its corner?
I can only live where there is light, but I die if the light shines on me. What am I?
What has keys but can't open doors?
What runs but never walks, has a bed but never sleeps, has a mouth but never eats?
What can't be used until it's broken?
What has many keys but can't open a single lock?
I’m tall when I’m young and short when I’m old. What am I?
What has an eye but cannot see?
What runs but never walks, has a bed but never sleeps?
What has teeth but cannot bite?
What's inside you that can be touched but can't be seen?
The more of it there is, the less you see. What is it?
What can travel up and down stairs without moving?
I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
I can fly without wings. I can cry without eyes. Whenever I go, darkness flies. What am I?
hint: You see it in the sky.

question: What has wheels and flies, but is not an aircraft?
What breaks yet never falls, and what falls yet never breaks?
What has no body and no shape, yet can always be heard?
hint: You use it when you speak.

question: I have no life, but I can die. I don't have a body, but I can grow. What am I?
I am invisible, weigh nothing, and if you put me in a barrel, it will make it lighter. What am I?
What has one head, one foot, and four legs?
I am not alive, but I can grow. I don't have lungs, but I need air. What am I?
I am an odd number. Take away one letter and I become even. What am I?
I can fly without wings. If I lose my warmth, I die. What am I?
hint: People ride on me in the sky.

question: What has a spine but no bones?
hint: It holds a lot of words.

question: I shave every day, but my beard stays the same. What am I?
What can go up a chimney down, but not down a chimney up?
What can be broken without being held?
I am lighter than air, but a hundred people cannot lift me. What am I?
hint: Children love to play with me.

question: I am not a living thing, but I can make people cry or smile. What am I?
hint: You often see me in theaters.

question: What can't talk but will reply when spoken to?
hint: You can hear it when facing a canyon.

question: What gets sharper the more you use it?
What is always in front of you but can't be seen?
If you drop me, I'm sure to crack, but give me a smile and I'll always smile back. What am I?
What has no beginning, end, or middle?
hint: You can draw it with one stroke.
